column2: This position is part of a team that builds international (outside of the United States) quotes for our Sales Managers        There will be significant interfacing with telecom carriers, sales agents and other staff members      The ideal candidate will possess excellent critical thinking and analysis skills, communicate well with all levels of personnel and be highly organized      You must have strong computer skills and operate well in a true multi-tasking environment        Must be able to work in a demanding international environment and meet deadlines      Must have good english writing and grammar skills      Must be detail oriented      Must be computer literate and know how to use Microsoft Word, Outlook and Excel      International Telecom experience is essential      Must have an understanding of global internet services      Must have good math skills      Must be able to learn quickly and work with minimal supervision

This role with some prior actuarial experience (not limited to pricing work)      This requires an enthusiastic learner who can work on the pricing models and help on various research and analysis to develop pricing assumptions with guidance      The person will closely work and support the product development work      The job requires some base knowledge of analytical tools like R and Python which can assist in general data analytical work        Responsibilities          Pricing quotes within the agreed timelines and established quality standards          Work with different functions like BD, Underwriting and Claims on to ensure the information used for pricing is complete and accurate.          Maintaining complete and accurate pricing documentation.          Work on various data analytics projects to support different pricing assumptions.          Support research and analysis as required for product development and other actuarial work.          Drafting proposal and treaty documentation.          Education and Experience          bachelors degree in Mathematics, Finance, Statistics, Actuarial Science or a related field          Cleared minimum 3 exams from a recognized Actuarial Institute as per new curriculum.          Candidate with Internship experience are preferred.          Skills and Abilities          Excellent oral and written Communication skills and ability to communicate complex problem to variety of stakeholders.          Sound working knowledge of MS Excel, Macros, MS Word and any actuarial/statistical software.          Working knowledge of software like Oracle, R and Python would be preferred.          An ability to set and manage priorities in a changing work environment is essential
column11: Reinsurance, Claims, Underwriting, Analytical, Actuarial, Management, Oracle, Macros, Internship, Python
